Posts.Content: Funclassygal wrote: Never had any thing wrong - no surgeries, no pills -- 51 years old.  Very diligent with all mamos, had only one call back due to calcifications but it was all good. I wake up one morning and feel something hard in my left breast..........one lymph node positive.  My biggest fear is chemo and pills but I guess I have no choice.  Has anyone had any decent experiences - that would really help to here.  Thank you, VeraAnn Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Diagnosed on Wednesday and very very scared! Funclassygal Funclassygal
